description:
If the European Expansion wasn’t enough for you and you’re looking to enhance your Wingspan digital experience further, Oceania adds 95 bird cards, 5 bonus cards, 4 goal tiles, new player mats, and a new nectar food type. Wingspan: Oceania Expansion is a DLC for the digital adaptation of Wingspan and is a tableau-building game […]

Source
title: Wingspan: Oceania Expansion DLC Review

description:
What’s this? Kickstarters of the Week is no more? Much like when we changed our Kickstarter roundup article to be many campaigns vs one, we felt like it was time for a change again. With Gamefound now being a serious player in the crowdfunding game, and Backerkit trying, it was time to broaden our scope. […]

title: Crowdfunding Quest – 3/4/24
